com.utils.library

类 StringUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.utils.library.StringUtil

  • public class StringUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    提供些常用的字符串相关的工具方法

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      StringUtil()

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static java.lang.String capitalizeFirstLetter(java.lang.String str)
      首字母大写 capitalize first letter capitalizeFirstLetter(null) = null; capitalizeFirstLetter("") = ""; capitalizeFirstLetter("2ab") = "2ab" capitalizeFirstLetter("a") = "A" capitalizeFirstLetter("ab") = "Ab" capitalizeFirstLetter("Abc") = "Abc"
      static int countSubStr(java.lang.String string, java.lang.String str)
      获取字符串str在String中出现的次数
      static java.lang.String full2Half(java.lang.String str)
      全角字符变半角字符
      static java.lang.String fullWidthToHalfWidth(java.lang.String s)
      全角转半角 transform half width char to full width char fullWidthToHalfWidth(null) = null; fullWidthToHalfWidth("") = ""; fullWidthToHalfWidth(new String(new char[] {12288})) = " "; fullWidthToHalfWidth("！
      static java.lang.String getHideEmailPrefix(java.lang.String email)
      隐藏邮件地址前缀。
      static java.lang.String getHrefInnerHtml(java.lang.String href)
      get innerHtml from href getHrefInnerHtml(null) = "" getHrefInnerHtml("") = "" getHrefInnerHtml("mp3") = "mp3"; getHrefInnerHtml("<a innerHtml</a>") = "<a innerHtml</a>"; getHrefInnerHtml("<a>innerHtml</a>") = "innerHtml"; getHrefInnerHtml("<a<a>innerHtml</a>") = "innerHtml"; getHrefInnerHtml("<a href="baidu.com">innerHtml</a>") = "innerHtml"; getHrefInnerHtml("<a href="baidu.com" title="baidu">innerHtml</a>") = "innerHtml"; getHrefInnerHtml(" <a>innerHtml</a> ") = "innerHtml"; getHrefInnerHtml("<a>innerHtml</a></a>") = "innerHtml"; getHrefInnerHtml("jack<a>innerHtml</a></a>") = "innerHtml"; getHrefInnerHtml("<a>innerHtml1</a><a>innerHtml2</a>") = "innerHtml2";
      static java.lang.String getLimitLengthStr(java.lang.String str, int len, java.lang.String symbol)
      截取字符串　超出的字符用symbol代替
      java.lang.String getStrEncode(java.lang.String str)
      获取字符串的编码
      static int getStrLength(java.lang.String str)
      取得字符串的实际长度（考虑了汉字的情况一个汉字按照俩个字符算）
      static java.lang.String halfWidthToFullWidth(java.lang.String s)
      半角转全角 transform full width char to half width char halfWidthToFullWidth(null) = null; halfWidthToFullWidth("") = ""; halfWidthToFullWidth(" ") = new String(new char[] {12288}); halfWidthToFullWidth("!
      static java.lang.String htmlEscapeCharsToString(java.lang.String source)
      替换html中的特殊字符 process special char in html htmlEscapeCharsToString(null) = null; htmlEscapeCharsToString("") = ""; htmlEscapeCharsToString("mp3") = "mp3"; htmlEscapeCharsToString("mp3<") = "mp3<"; htmlEscapeCharsToString("mp3>") = "mp3\>"; htmlEscapeCharsToString("mp3&mp4") = "mp3&mp4"; htmlEscapeCharsToString("mp3"mp4") = "mp3\"mp4"; htmlEscapeCharsToString("mp3<>&"mp4") = "mp3\<\>&\"mp4";
      static boolean isEmpty(java.lang.CharSequence str)
      判断是否是空字符串、null、"" Returns true if the string is null or 0-length.
      static java.lang.String left(java.lang.String input, int count)
      截取字符串左侧指定长度的字符串

      将list 用传入的分隔符组装为String
      static java.lang.String nullToEmptyStr(java.lang.Object str)
      null Object to empty string nullStrToEmpty(null) = ""; nullStrToEmpty("") = ""; nullStrToEmpty("aa") = "aa";

      repeat - 通过源字符串重复生成N次组成新的字符串。

      截取字符串右侧指定长度的字符串

      字符串相似度比较(速度较快)

      字符串省略截取 字符串截取到指定长度size+...的形式

      删除所有的标点符号

      utf8编码 encoded in utf-8 utf8Encode(null) = null utf8Encode("") = ""; utf8Encode("aa") = "aa"; utf8Encode("啊啊啊啊") = "%E5%95%8A%E5%95%8A%E5%95%8A%E5%95%8A";

      encoded in utf-8, if exception, return defultReturn

      • isEmpty

        public static boolean isEmpty(@Nullable
                              java.lang.CharSequence str)
        判断是否是空字符串、null、"" Returns true if the string is null or 0-length.
        参数:
        str - the string to be examined
        返回:
        true if str is null or zero length

        参数:

        size -
        返回:

      • getLimitLengthStr

        public static java.lang.String getLimitLengthStr(java.lang.String str,
                                                 int len,
                                                 java.lang.String symbol)
        截取字符串　超出的字符用symbol代替
        参数:
        len - 字符串长度　长度计量单位为一个GBK汉字　　两个英文字母计算为一个单位长度
        str -
        symbol -
        返回:

      • getStrLength

        public static int getStrLength(java.lang.String str)
        取得字符串的实际长度（考虑了汉字的情况一个汉字按照俩个字符算）
        参数:
        str - 源字符串
        返回:
        字符串的实际长度

      • getHideEmailPrefix

        public static java.lang.String getHideEmailPrefix(java.lang.String email)
        隐藏邮件地址前缀。
        参数:
        email - - EMail邮箱地址 例如: linwenguo@koubei.com 等等...
        返回:
        返回已隐藏前缀邮件地址, 如 *********@koubei.com.

      • repeat

        public static java.lang.String repeat(java.lang.String src,
                                      int num)
        repeat - 通过源字符串重复生成N次组成新的字符串。
        参数:
        src - - 源字符串 例如: 空格(" "), 星号("*"), "浙江" 等等...
        num - - 重复生成次数
        返回:
        返回已生成的重复字符串

      • nullToEmptyStr

        public static java.lang.String nullToEmptyStr(java.lang.Object str)
        null Object to empty string 
         nullStrToEmpty(null) = "";
 nullStrToEmpty("") = "";
 nullStrToEmpty("aa") = "aa";
        参数:
        str -
        返回:

      • capitalizeFirstLetter

        public static java.lang.String capitalizeFirstLetter(java.lang.String str)
        首字母大写 capitalize first letter 
         capitalizeFirstLetter(null)     =   null;
 capitalizeFirstLetter("")       =   "";
 capitalizeFirstLetter("2ab")    =   "2ab"
 capitalizeFirstLetter("a")      =   "A"
 capitalizeFirstLetter("ab")     =   "Ab"
 capitalizeFirstLetter("Abc")    =   "Abc"
        参数:
        str -
        返回:

      • utf8Encode

        public static java.lang.String utf8Encode(java.lang.String str)
        utf8编码 encoded in utf-8 
         utf8Encode(null)        =   null
 utf8Encode("")          =   "";
 utf8Encode("aa")        =   "aa";
 utf8Encode("啊啊啊啊")   = "%E5%95%8A%E5%95%8A%E5%95%8A%E5%95%8A";
        参数:
        str -
        返回:
        抛出:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - if an error occurs

      • utf8Encode

        public static java.lang.String utf8Encode(java.lang.String str,
                                          java.lang.String defultReturn)
        encoded in utf-8, if exception, return defultReturn
        参数:
        str -
        defultReturn -
        返回:

      • getHrefInnerHtml

        public static java.lang.String getHrefInnerHtml(java.lang.String href)
        get innerHtml from href 
         getHrefInnerHtml(null)                                  = ""
 getHrefInnerHtml("")                                    = ""
 getHrefInnerHtml("mp3")                                 = "mp3";
 getHrefInnerHtml("<a innerHtml</a>")                    = "<a innerHtml</a>";
 getHrefInnerHtml("<a>innerHtml</a>")                    = "innerHtml";
 getHrefInnerHtml("<a<a>innerHtml</a>")                    = "innerHtml";
 getHrefInnerHtml("<a href="baidu.com">innerHtml</a>")               = "innerHtml";
 getHrefInnerHtml("<a href="baidu.com" title="baidu">innerHtml</a>") = "innerHtml";
 getHrefInnerHtml("   <a>innerHtml</a>  ")                           = "innerHtml";
 getHrefInnerHtml("<a>innerHtml</a></a>")                      = "innerHtml";
 getHrefInnerHtml("jack<a>innerHtml</a></a>")                  = "innerHtml";
 getHrefInnerHtml("<a>innerHtml1</a><a>innerHtml2</a>")        = "innerHtml2";
        参数:
        href -
        返回:
        • if href is null, return ""
        • if not match regx, return source
        • return the last string that match regx

      • htmlEscapeCharsToString

        public static java.lang.String htmlEscapeCharsToString(java.lang.String source)
        替换html中的特殊字符 process special char in html 
         htmlEscapeCharsToString(null) = null;
 htmlEscapeCharsToString("") = "";
 htmlEscapeCharsToString("mp3") = "mp3";
 htmlEscapeCharsToString("mp3<") = "mp3<";
 htmlEscapeCharsToString("mp3>") = "mp3\>";
 htmlEscapeCharsToString("mp3&mp4") = "mp3&mp4";
 htmlEscapeCharsToString("mp3"mp4") = "mp3\"mp4";
 htmlEscapeCharsToString("mp3<>&"mp4") = "mp3\<\>&\"mp4";
        参数:
        source -
        返回:

      • fullWidthToHalfWidth

        public static java.lang.String fullWidthToHalfWidth(java.lang.String s)
        全角转半角 transform half width char to full width char 
         fullWidthToHalfWidth(null) = null;
 fullWidthToHalfWidth("") = "";
 fullWidthToHalfWidth(new String(new char[] {12288})) = " ";
 fullWidthToHalfWidth("！＂＃＄％＆) = "!\"#$%&";
        参数:
        s -
        返回:

      • halfWidthToFullWidth

        public static java.lang.String halfWidthToFullWidth(java.lang.String s)
        半角转全角 transform full width char to half width char 
         halfWidthToFullWidth(null) = null;
 halfWidthToFullWidth("") = "";
 halfWidthToFullWidth(" ") = new String(new char[] {12288});
 halfWidthToFullWidth("!\"#$%&) = "！＂＃＄％＆";
        参数:
        s -
        返回:
